title: GDG DevFest 2015 Announced
brief: GDG Yangon is proud to announce the GDG DevFest 2015 - the largest Google related event in Myanmar. The event will be held on 3 October in Yangon, Myanmar. So aside all your business at this time and register!

title: Announcing the speakers & Topics
brief: We're very excited - not just because of the inordinate amount of caffeine based products consumed - but also because our team are putting together the final missing parts to the biggest Google related event in Myanmar - GDG DevFest 2015.

title: Web & Android Code Labs
brief: We are running two code labs : Web and Android. Limited swags for the attendees and register now!
